title: Avatar
overview: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission.

title: Titanic
overview: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious.

title: The Avengers
overview: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team.

title: The Dark Knight
overview: Batman raises the stakes in his war on crime. With the help of Lt. Jim Gordon and DA Harvey Dent.

title: Inception
overview: A thief who steals corporate secrets through use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse.

title: Interstellar
overview: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

title: The Matrix
overview: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality.

title: Gladiator
overview: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor.

title: The Godfather
overview: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control to his reluctant son.

title: Toy Story
overview: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him.
